title: Discover the Trifecta of Mindfulness, Meditation and Manifesting | Emily Fletcher on Health Theory
description: This week’s guest on Health Theory is Emily Fletcher.  Emily Fletcher is the leading expert in meditation for high performance and the founder of Ziva, where she helps people perform at the top of their game with meditation and mindfulness techniques.  In this episode, she talks about how meditation can inform personal and professional development.
